text:
Abine - the online privacy co | Software Engineers | Boston or REMOTE | https://www.abine.com/index.html

Looking for strong full-stack dev's - part time is ok to start - who are interested in protecting consumer privacy, good at working independently, and who are not inclined to jump from contract to contract every few months.

Weâ€™re a profitable privacy company with many years of experience with products used by millions globally. Please briefly outline your interest, include a CV and if possible desired compensation and ideal role to jobs at getabine dotcom. Thanks!
